DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study prospectively evaluate incidence hemodynamic compromise obtain long-term survival data patient AMPLATZER Septal Occluder
DOC.brief_title: Closure Atrial Septal Defects With AMPLATZER Septal Occluder - Post Approval Study
DOC.criteria: Patients must meet inclusion criterion . A patient meet inclusion criterion he/she : indicate implantation AMPLATZER Septal Occluder occlusion secundum atrial septal defect ( Note : This include indication closure fenestration follow fenestrated Fontan procedure ) , willing able complete followup requirement study , sign inform consent ( legal representative sign inform consent ) .
